items.name: Malindi Ocean Legacy Center
items.short_description: Dive into interactive exhibits showcasing Malindi's rich marine biodiversity and learn about critical conservation efforts. A must-visit for ocean enthusiasts and families.
items.address: Off Casuarina Road, Near Malindi Marine National Park, Malindi

items.name: Bahari Canvas Gallery & Studio
items.short_description: Explore contemporary Kenyan art inspired by the coast and participate in engaging craft workshops led by local artisans. A vibrant space for creativity and cultural exchange.

items.name: Kilifi Creek Eco-Resort & Spice Gardens
items.short_description: A serene escape offering sustainable luxury accommodations amidst lush botanical spice gardens. Indulge in farm-to-table dining and immersive nature walks.

items.name: Malindi Sky Trails Adventure Park
items.short_description: Get your adrenaline pumping with thrilling ziplines, rope courses, and obstacle challenges set amidst natural coastal forest. Fun for all ages and fitness levels.
items.address: Galana River Road, Near Malindi Golf & Country Club, Malindi

items.name: Sunset Azure Rooftop Lounge
items.short_description: Enjoy breathtaking panoramic views of the Indian Ocean while sipping on craft cocktails and indulging in delicious bites. The perfect spot for sundowners and evening relaxation.
items.address: Top Floor, Ocean View Towers, Vasco da Gama Road, Malindi

items.name: Pwani Bites & Culinary Studio
items.short_description: Discover the fusion of traditional Swahili flavors with modern culinary techniques. Enjoy hands-on cooking classes or savor a unique tasting menu in a chic, contemporary setting.

items.name: Shanti Oasis Wellness Retreat
items.short_description: Find your inner peace at this serene sanctuary offering daily yoga classes, meditation sessions, and holistic spa treatments. Embrace tranquility by the coast.
items.address: Off Malindi-Mombasa Highway, Near Mambrui Beach, Malindi

items.name: Malindi Echoes Heritage Center
items.short_description: Step back in time with immersive exhibits and virtual reality experiences telling the rich history of Malindi, from ancient Swahili trade to colonial influence.
items.address: Near Vasco da Gama Pillar, Malindi Town, Malindi

items.name: Coast Bean Roasters & Cafe
items.short_description: Experience the aroma of freshly roasted Kenyan coffee right here in Malindi. Enjoy artisanal brews, light snacks, and a cozy atmosphere perfect for relaxing or working.

items.name: Mida Creek Mangrove Boardwalk
items.short_description: Wander through the mystical mangrove forests of Mida Creek on an elevated boardwalk. Discover unique flora and fauna and enjoy unparalleled birdwatching opportunities.
